bug.short_desc: OpenGrok 0.7 does not allow searching across 'All' projects

long_desc.thetext:
Hi,
As of OpenGrok 0.7 we need to select a Project before we can search in OpenGrok. But the main use case for which we use OpenGrok is to search for a term across 'All' projects.
Could you please help me know when this feature will be supported? Is it expected to come in the next release and when is the next release?
Thanks in advance.

I'd like to close this as duplicate of http://defect.opensolaris.org/bz/show_bug.cgi?id=341 if you don't mind ...
we plan above bug in 0.8 , I checked newer lucene and it seems it has a support for this directly in its code, so I'd like to get lucene updated and then add a search through all the projects. Eventually I'd like to change the selector box in the way, that you can pick several projects and search only through them ...
